Title: Does post-event cognitive load undermine thought suppression and increase intrusive memories after exposure to an analogue stressor?
Author: Nixon, Reginald D. V.; Cain, Neralie; Nehmy, Thomas; Seymour, Melanie
ExperimentalCondition: Hyperventilation provocation test and thought suppression
ResultSummary: Both conditions did not significantly in terms of intrusion distress.
